preferences.name: topic_refresh_interval

preferences.name: participants_refresh_interval
preferences.title: Participant list refresh interval
preferences.description: Amount of seconds to wait to refresh the participants if the channel is over full (over 1000 participants)

preferences.name: show_all_chatters
